title: How to beat / counter gnar?
body:
Hey so this guy's been out for a good little while now and everyone in diamond and challenger seems to agree he is op.

What I want to know is which champ is best to pick into this guy? I have been suggested Pantheon so I tried that and that works up until around level 9 where gnar still takes a shit all over him just like he does every other champ. I've been thinking vayne, any other suggestions?
